title: What champion can 1v5
body:
I am trying to find a champion who can 1v5 vs 8 sets of cc, 2 heavy ap nukers, 2 heavy resistance player focused tanks and an adc with high damage finisher.

Any help is welcome.

replies.body: Have you tried actually playing the game as it's intended. As a TEAM game.
I always play the game as a team game, when my team actually exists.
Hack in release Xin Xao, profit.
you cant 1v5 when they have 8 cc abilities.
Irelia, doesn't matter who or what it is once you see her on the loading screen it's gg

No one seems to have an answer?

Because I swear that high elo players are their purely because of how they play, not because they rely on their team to do their job. They would have to do the jobs of all the other people who do not have the capacity to do their job.

Everyone keeps telling me that teammates are not a constant factor in every game.
Vi, cause she's broken cancer with no counterplay, ult the adc and they're dead as they cannot move.
You're in the wrong season. Gotta go back to season 2/3
